title: Abu Dhabi Starts Using Facial Covid Scanners at Malls and Airports
content:
1. Abu Dhabi Starts Using Facial Covid Scanners at Malls and Airports  Bloomberg
  2. Abu Dhabi to ban unvaccinated people from most public places  BNO News
  3. Abu Dhabi Is Now Using Facial Scanners to Test COVID-19 in Public  Interesting Engineering
  4. Facial scanners for COVID-19 screening installed in Abu Dhabi  Time Out Abu Dhabi
  5. Abu Dhabi will only allow vaccinated people in some public spaces from Aug 20  Reuters
